name: SnowGame
description:
This game was made for Game Jam called

 "Процедурные приключения пива с крендельками!"

In this game you need to throw snow balls to your enemy.

You can win but also you can die and be loser.

The bottle of beer and bar on the top - your 

and your enemy health bar.

One snow ball damage is 25%, You have 100% 

of health!
Good game!

keys to move: WASD

rotate camera with MOUSE

to check your beer press RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON

to throw the snow ball click LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

UPD: This game supports two languages - Russian and English)

UPD: Some buttons don't work in HTML build, You can download game - it's desirable.

Update game 06.01.2023: bugs fixed, added trailer, changed enemy mechanics.
